[b][u]Pros[/u][/b]
[list][*][b]Sound[/b] (You can perfectly hear where exactly are the sounds coming from)
[*][b]Movement mechanics[/b] (Works just great)
[*][b]Gun feel[/b] (You actually feel the power under your control)
[/list]
[b][u]Cons[/u][/b]
[list][*][b]Anticheat[/b] (cheaters are literally everywhere, especially in the lower ranks)
[*][b]Servers[/b] (The official servers are just bad due to low tickrate)
[*][b]Tutorial[/b] (No real in-game tutorial that would teach new players and help them get better; luckily, there is the community)
[/list]
[b][u]Summary[/u][/b]
The game is really great and amazing, but it isn't very open to new players. Instead of warm welcome they get cheaters in every game. Trust me though, that if you get through the low trust-factor levels and up to higher ranks, the game is just perfection.
Me parece un juego bastante entretenido, si juegas con amigos es mucho mejor, en solitario acaba siendo un poco aburrido
